title: My clients not booting up
body:
I've been using the new client without fail, since its rolled out.

And now it just plain refuses to start up after the LOL icon shows.

Need help

replies.body: It may have crashed in the background without an error message.  Check your task manager to see if league is still running, or restart your PC entirely.  If the issue persists then a security setting may have changed and is blocking the patcher from launching.  Go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix that up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
